videos.headline: App State's Jackson returns blocked punt for TD
videos.description: Appalachian State blocks Chandler Staton's punt and D'Marco Jackson scoops it up to score a 17-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (App State’s Jackson returns blocked punt for TD) 2019/9/7 ESHEET
